definition: Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing

sentences.english: The hydrazine argument is similarly suspect.
sentences.chinese: 关于肼的说法也同样可疑。

sentences.english: The current situation about high energy oxidizer of hydrazinium nitroformate(HNF) at abroad was introduced with 13 references.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了近年来国外高能氧化剂硝仿肼的研究情况。

sentences.english: Recently the reactivity of nitric esters in the presence of hydrazine has been investigated .
sentences.chinese: 人们近来研究了有肼存在时硝酸酯的反应性。

sentences.english: The material is readily prepared by reaction of formaldehyde and hydrazine.
sentences.chinese: 这种物质很容易由甲醛和肼反应而得到。

sentences.english: The electrolysis oxidation and catalysis decomposition of hydrazine in HNO_3 are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了肼在硝酸溶液中的电解氧化和催化分解。

sentences.english: Some informations on foreign production of hydrazine hydrate and anhydrous hydrazine are provided.
sentences.chinese: 提供了国外近期有关水合肼和无水肼生产信息。

sentences.english: A new method to determine ferrum in anhydrous hydrazine by graphite furnace atomic absorption spectrometry was set up.
sentences.chinese: 建立了测定无水肼中铁含量的石墨炉原子吸收法。

sentences.english: Method 40 colorectal cancer model of rat were induced by 1% dimethylhydrazine(DMH).
sentences.chinese: 方法二甲基肼诱发大鼠大肠癌模型40例。
